name: politicians
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool goverlytics.
Tool description: The Goverlytics API.
API description: Fetches a list of politicians' data based on given filters.

offset.description: The starting point in the list of results. Defaults to None.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to None.

active.description: Filter for active politicians. Defaults to None.

province.description: Filter politicians by province. Defaults to None.

municipality.description: Filter politicians by municipality. Defaults to None.

level_of_government.description: Filter politicians by level of government (e.g., federal, provincial, municipal). Defaults to None.
